SELECT mr.id, CONCAT(IFNULL(h.residential,'*'),IFNULL(CONCAT(h.building,'栋'),'*栋'), IFNULL(CONCAT(h.unit,'单元'),'*单元'), IFNULL(CONCAT(h.number,'号'),'*号')) as houseAddress, mr.owner_name ownerName, mr.owner_mobile ownerMobile, mr.state FROM dj_maintenance_record mr, dj_house h WHERE mr.house_id = h.id
AND CONCAT(CONCAT_WS(IFNULL(h.residential, '*'),IFNULL(CONCAT(h.building, '栋'),'*栋'),IFNULL(CONCAT(h.unit, '单元'),'*单元'),IFNULL(CONCAT(h.number, '号'),'*号')),mr.owner_name,mr.owner_mobile) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%')
select owner_name as ownerName, create_date as createDate, owner_image as ownerImage, owner_remark as ownerRemark From dj_maintenance_record where house_id=#{houseId}
